item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
Thali- Regional Cuisine of India

Thali is one of New Haven's most celebrated restaurants and has some of the best Indian food in the Elm City. In honor of the NHC's first ever happy hour at Thali, we've reserved the entire bar area just for NHC members and friends for the evening. The manager has been gracious to offer the following discounted drinks for our happy hour.

All Beers (bottles or drafts) - $5.00
Wine - $7.00
Mixed Drinks - $8.00

In addition, there will be a small selection of Thali's food for us to sample throughout the evening.


Special thanks to fellow NHC member Parry for setting up this weeks happy hour for the group.

Contact info: Jeanie 860-942-4708

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...
Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

***Bring a friend***
